name: Lying Neck Extension (Weighted)
description: Targets the muscles at the back of the neck through weighted extensions.

name: Lying Neck Curls (Weighted)
description: Strengthens the front neck muscles by performing weighted curls while lying down.

name: Seated Neck Flexion (Bodyweight)
description: Strengthens the neck flexors by tilting the head forward while seated without added weight.

name: Seated Neck Extension (Bodyweight)
description: Engages the neck extensors by tilting the head backward while seated without added weight.

name: Side Neck Flexion (Bodyweight)
description: Targets the lateral neck muscles by tilting the head side to side without added weight.

name: Neck Isometric Holds
description: Improves neck stability by holding the head in various positions against resistance for a duration.

name: Shrugs (Dumbbell)
description: Strengthens the upper trapezius and neck muscles by lifting the shoulders upward while holding dumbbells.

name: Resistance Band Neck Extension
description: Targets the neck extensors using a resistance band for added tension during extension movements.

name: Neck Rotation (Bodyweight)
description: Enhances neck mobility and strength by rotating the head from side to side without added weight.

name: Front Neck Bridge
description: Strengthens the neck and spine by supporting the body weight on the forehead and toes in a bridge position.
